mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `game_name` AS gameName, `game_logo` AS gameLogo, `game_introduce` AS introduce, `game_url` AS gameURL, `receive_amount` AS receiveAmount, `new_register` AS newRegister, `total_money` AS totalMoney, `new_buyer_money` AS newBuyerMoney, `view_url` AS viewURL, `is_send_msg` AS isSendMsg, `msg_content` AS msgContent, `is_available` AS isAvailable, `create_time` AS createTime FROM game WHERE id = #{gameId} AND is_available = 1
SELECT id, game_id AS gameId, coupon_id AS couponId, validity_date_type AS validityDateType, days, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM game_prize WHERE game_id=#{gameId}
mapper.update: UPDATE game SET receive_amount=receive_amount+1 WHERE id=#{gameId}
UPDATE game SET new_register=new_register+1 WHERE id=#{gameId}
mapper.select: SELECT t2.activity_id FROM register_mobile_coupon t1, relation_activity_and_received_mobile t2 WHERE t1.mobile_number = t2.mobile_number AND t1.coupon_id = t2.coupon_id AND t1.source_type=#{sourceType} AND t2.mobile_number = #{mobileNumber} AND t2.acitvity_type=#{acitvityType} ORDER BY t2.id LIMIT 1
